sentences.cn: “那真令人吃惊。”——“这有什么，”我不露声色地说。

sentences.en: A surprising number of ailments are caused by unsuspected environmental factors.
sentences.cn: 有大量疾病是由不明环境因素造成的。

sentences.en: A surprising number of customers order the same sandwich every day.
sentences.cn: 每天点同一种三明治的顾客多得惊人。

sentences.en: A surprising number of his paintings have survived.
sentences.cn: 他的存世画作多得出奇。

sentences.en: He was moving with surprising speed for a man of his years.
sentences.cn: 他的行动速度对于他那个年纪的人来说很是惊人。

sentences.en: It is a rather surprising result.
sentences.cn: 这是相当令人吃惊的成就.

sentences.en: It is hardly surprising that new mothers often suffer from depression.
sentences.cn: 初为人母者常患上抑郁症是不足为奇的。

sentences.en: It is not surprising that children learn to read at different rates.
sentences.cn: 小孩子识字的速度不同，这不足为奇。

sentences.en: It is not surprising that such a view has led to very considerable conflict.
sentences.cn: 这样的一种观点引起很大的分歧是不足为怪的.

sentences.en: It is not surprising they did so badly in last year's elections.
sentences.cn: 他们在去年选举中如此糟糕的表现并不奇怪。

sentences.en: It is surprising how soon historical personages became invested with romantic attributes.
sentences.cn: 令人惊奇的是历史人物很快就带有传奇的色彩.

sentences.en: It somehow seems hardly surprising that Ms Player is now his sworn enemy.
sentences.cn: 现在普莱耶女士成了他不共戴天的仇敌反倒让人觉得不足为奇了。

sentences.en: It was surprising that he finished writing a novel in only twenty days.
sentences.cn: 他在二十天内写完了一本小说,真令人吃惊.

sentences.en: She told me a surprising thing.
sentences.cn: 她告诉我一件令人吃惊的事。

sentences.en: She'd mentioned it casually once, surprising him by her unconcern.
sentences.cn: 她曾随口提到过，当时她的冷漠很让他吃惊。

sentences.en: That there are problems with this kind of definition is hardly surprising, given its level of generality.
sentences.cn: 由于其笼统性，不难料想这种定义会存在问题。

sentences.en: The anthology has a surprising sense of coherence.
sentences.cn: 整本选集有着惊人的连贯性。

sentences.en: The candidate made surprising inroads in the South.
sentences.cn: 那位候选人在南方出人意料地大为得手.

words.tran_cn: 感到惊讶的，出人意料的
使惊奇（surprise的过去分词形式）
意外的,忽然的,令人晕眩的

phrases.tran_cn: 使吃惊，使诧异，使感到意外

trans.tran_cn: 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）
